title: David Letterman
description:
In this episode Kevin sits down with legendary comedian and host of the Late Show, David Letterman. They discuss topics such as his favorite guests on the show, his top comedians on the scene right now, his 33-year career as a late night host, and what’s next for the comedy icon.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldmind
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, David Letterman)
